means: （使）加快， （使）增速( accelerate的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Recession has simply accelerated changes that have been reshaping the industry anyway.
sentence.Network_cn: 经济萧条只不过加速了原本就在改变行业状况的变化。

sentence.Network_en: During the last recession, migration to the sunbelt accelerated.
sentence.Network_cn: 在上个经济萧条期，人们向美国南部阳光地带移民的速度加快了。

sentence.Network_en: When we drew level, he neither slowed down nor accelerated.
sentence.Network_cn: 当我们齐头并进时，他既没有慢下来也没有加速。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 王玉梅托福词汇 Word_list_01_在线英语听力室 ... accelerate 加快，加速 accelerated 加速的，迅速的 accelerating 加速的.
《新航道：读故事记单词2014考研英语词... ... academy 学院，大学，研究院 accelerated 加快的；提早的 accentuate 使更明显；使 …
The capital construction has been accelerated and the environment for investment has been continuously improved., 基本建设速度加快 , 投资环境不断完善.
adjustment of industrial structure was accelerated by expanding the share of industries with high or new technologies characterized by information technology工业结构调整步伐加快，以信息技术为代表的高新技术产业比重提高；

list.abs: 新东方GRE词汇 - 豆丁网 ... accede ? v. 同意 accelerate ? v. 加速，促进 accessible ? adj. 易接近的 ，可理解的.
新东方GRE词汇 - 豆丁网 ... accede ? v. 同意 accelerate ? v. 加速，促进 accessible ? adj. 易接近的 ，可理解的.
-tion后缀 ... refrigeration 冷藏, 致冷, 冷却 acceleration 加速度,提前收益的 deceleration 减速.
职称英语考试综合类A级词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... accelerate vt. 加速,促进； accelerator n. 加速器，催化剂 accent n. 口音，重音.
化学及化工专业词汇英语翻译（A-Z） - 豆丁网 ... acceleration of gravity 重力加速度 accelerator 促进剂 acceptor 接受体.

entry.def: If the process or rate of something accelerates or if something accelerates it, it gets faster and faster.

example.ex: Growth will accelerate to 2.9 per cent next year...
The government is to accelerate its privatisation programme.
example.tran: 政府将加快其私有化计划的进程。

entry.def: When a moving vehicle accelerates, it goes faster and faster.

example.ex: She accelerated away from the kerb.
example.tran: 她加速驶离了马路牙子。

means.word_mean: 2. speeded up, as of an academic course;

auth_sentence.content: The pace of bankruptcies has accelerated over the summer.
auth_sentence.res_content: The pace of bankruptcies has accelerated over the summer.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The pace of bankruptcies has accelerated over the summer.

auth_sentence.content: With London closing in fast that process has accelerated.
auth_sentence.res_content: With London closing in fast that process has accelerated.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: With London closing in fast that process has accelerated.

auth_sentence.content: This contributed to Boer poverty and accelerated urbanisation.
auth_sentence.res_content: This contributed to Boer poverty and accelerated urbanisation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This contributed to Boer poverty and accelerated urbanisation.

Sentence.sentence: Although no form of matter yet discovered moves as fast as or faster than light, scientific experiments have already confirmed that accelerated motion causes a traveler's time to be stretched.
